Game.Name: Alexandra Ledermann - Aventures au Galop
Game.Plot: Alexandra Ledermann: Adventures at the Galop is an equestrian adventure game on Gameboy Advance. The title puts you in the shoes of a young rider who must entrust the bourrin to a club that will house and feed him provided that you take care of the management and maintenance of the canasson. You will also have the right to take your horse on the paths of dressage and competition of jumps.
